Package de.gnwi.mfsim.model.peptide

Class PeptideToSpices

java.lang.Object
de.gnwi.mfsim.model.peptide.PeptideToSpices
public class PeptideToSpices extends Object
Class for converting peptide definitions into to a particle-based SPICES.
Author:
Andreas Truszkowski

      aDefinition - The peptide definition. See description for further details.
      Returns:
      An error message or an empty string when no errors could be found.

    • convertOneLetterPeptideToSpices

      public String convertOneLetterPeptideToSpices(String aDefinition, boolean aDoCarriageReturn) throws DpdPeptideException
      Converts given one letter peptide defintion in a fragemnt based Spices.
      Parameters:
      aDefinition - The peptide definition. See description for further details.
      aDoCarriageReturn - True if after every amino acid a carriage return shall be added.
      Returns:
      Particle Spices.
      Throws:
      DpdPeptideException - DpdPeptideException

    • chargeOneLetterPeptide

      public String chargeOneLetterPeptide(String aDefinition, Double aPH) throws DpdPeptideException
      Adds charge arguments (C-, S+, N+,...) to the given one letter peptide amino acid sequence depending on given pH-value. Already applied charges will be removed first.
      Parameters:
      aDefinition - Peptide one letter amino acid sequence.
      aPH - The pH-value.
      Returns:
      The charged peptide definition.
      Throws:
      DpdPeptideException - DpdPeptideException

    • chargeOneLetterPeptide

      public String chargeOneLetterPeptide(String aDefinition, Double aPH, boolean anIsCircular) throws DpdPeptideException
      Adds charge arguments (C-, S+, N+,...) to the given one letter peptide amino acid sequence depending on given pH-value. Already applied charges will be removed first.
      Parameters:
      aDefinition - Peptide one letter amino acid sequence.
      aPH - The pH-value.
      anIsCircular - Is circular peptide.
      Returns:
      The charged peptide definition.
      Throws:
      DpdPeptideException - DpdPeptideException

    • handleFrequenciesBeforeCharging

      public String handleFrequenciesBeforeCharging(char[] aDefinition, int aLastAminoAcidIndex) throws DpdPeptideException
      Handles frequencies to describe correct N- or C-terminal particle charge.
      Parameters:
      aDefinition - Amino aced sequence in one leter code.
      aLastAminoAcidIndex - Index of last amino acid.
      Returns:
      Reworked sequence.
      Throws:
      DpdPeptideException - DpdPeptideException

    • getOneLetterSymbols

      public ArrayList<String> getOneLetterSymbols() throws DpdPeptideException
      Gets the one letter descriptions and symbols within a sorted map. The key corresponds to the description, the value defines the symbol.
      Returns:
      Sorted symbol array.
      Throws:
      DpdPeptideException - DpdPeptideException
